name: Olliefrog Toad Skater Demo
description:
(FEEDBACK SURVEY: https://forms.gle/PoTAmJuZFkvk25Jt5)
(WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2005910/Olliefrog_Toad_Skater/)

This is here is demo for Olliefrog Toad Skater! Its still missing a few features, but this proof of concept should give players enough tools to let them express themselves both in the dressing room and off the quarter pipe.

(Pro-comboing tip: you can trigger a manual hitting up and down on the stick or dpad. This can also be buffered right before landing!)

Controls (XBox):

Left Stick - decelerate (hold back), steer (left/right)

A - Crouch/Ollie/Wallplant

B - Grab tricks (when combined with a left stick direction)

X - Flip tricks (when combined with a left stick direction)

Y - Grind/wallride (when ur near coping or rail while in the air)

Left Bumper/Right Bumper - steer (left/right)

Right Trigger - Revert/Acid Drop/Spine Transfer/Level-Out from vert

Menu/Start - Pause

Controls (Keyboard)

S - Decelereate

A/D - Steer

Spacebar - Crouch/Ollie/Wallplant

Right Arrow Key - Grab Tricks (when combined w/ W/A/S/D)

Left Arrow Key - Flip Tricks (when combined w/ W/A/S/D)

Up Arrow Key - Grind/Wallride (when ur near coping or rail while in the air)

Left Shift - Revert

Esc/P - Pause
